body_html:
img = np.array(PIL.Image.open(image_path).resize((224, 224))).astype(np.uint8) / 128 - 1

this looks wrong as it will make the range -1 to 1 . you want to feed 0,255 which is probably what it was
so try feeding

img = np.array(PIL.Image.open(image_path).resize((224, 224))).astype(np.uint8)

but check by checking mins and maxes of the img array once done ...

body:
```
img = np.array(PIL.Image.open(image_path).resize((224, 224))).astype(np.uint8) / 128 - 1
```

this looks wrong as it will make the range -1 to 1 . you want to feed 0,255 which is probably what it was
so try feeding
```
img = np.array(PIL.Image.open(image_path).resize((224, 224))).astype(np.uint8)
```
but check by checking mins and maxes of the img array once done ...
